name: Cards & Pets
description:
Description

As a Pet Shop manager, you may care for your client’s Pet in the best possible way. In an unusual combination of Card Game and Tamagotchi, the Cards & Pets has intense gameplay. The player’s goal is to fulfill the Pet’s needs as it asks for, rushing against time to maintain your store’s reputation.

Instructions

  • Left Click on card selects it to use on the Pet.
  • Right Click on card redraw the card, but it locks the card for 1 second.
  • When you use the card requested, the Pet becomes happier.
  • The Pet becomes unhappy when you use the wrong card.
  • When the pet care time is over, the player earns a reputation based on the pet’s happiness value.
  • The Game ends when the reputation reaches the maximum or the minimum.
  • Press ESC for Options Menu

Source Code: https://github.com/raphaelbp12/8th-klujam-gamejam
